## Organizing Committee

The JoVI organizers (in alphabetical order) are:

- [Lonni Besançon](https://lonnibesancon.me/), Linköping University (Github ID: [@lonnibesancon](https://github.com/lonnibesancon))
- [Florian Echtler](https://floe.butterbrot.org/), Aalborg University (Github ID: [@floe](https://github.com/floe))
- [Matthew Kay](https://www.mjskay.com/), Northwestern University (Github ID: [@mjskay](https://github.com/mjskay))
- [Chat Wacharamanotham](https://chatchavan.github.io), University of Zurich (Github ID: [@chatchavan](https://github.com/chatchavan))

JoVI also owes a huge debt to [Steve Haroz](http://steveharoz.com/), who was instrumental in its formation and early iterations.
